summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4465 for the improvement of Taft Street from COrnell Avenue to Ryan Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 52606, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
